intro: Funastrum filiforme, commonly known as the slender funastrum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its slender, creeping stems and small, egg-shaped leaves. The plant produces yellowish-white flowers that are clustered in loose inflorescences. It is native to parts of Africa and is often found in moist, sandy soils. Funastrum filiforme is typically used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
